name: HO HO XO
description:
An original variation of the Tic-tac-toe game, with 5 symbols, a 5x5 grid and a more elaborate game mechanic. Pay attention to the next 3 items!

The next 3 items that will be placed on the grid are visible at all times, so you plan your strategy accordingly.

Deceptively simple, yet hard to master. Requires focus and forward thinking.

If you found the game interesting, please support the game! Thanks!
